document_classification.prompt: Analyze this document image and classify it into one of these categories: passport, id_card, receipt, invoice, contract, letter, form, business_card, certificate, other. Respond with a JSON object containing: {"type": "category", "confidence": 0.0-1.0, "description": "brief description"}

ocr_extraction.prompt: Extract all text from this document image. Preserve the layout and structure as much as possible. Return the extracted text in a clean, readable format.

form_detection.prompt: Analyze this document and identify all form fields. For each field, provide: {"fields": [{"name": "field name", "type": "text|number|date|checkbox", "value": "current value if visible", "position": "approximate position"}]}

content_summarization.prompt: Provide a concise summary of this document in 2-3 sentences. Focus on the main topic, key points, and any important dates or numbers.

privacy_scan.prompt: Scan this document for sensitive information including: personal names, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, social security numbers, credit card numbers, passport numbers, dates of birth. Return as JSON: {"has_sensitive_data": true/false, "types": ["list of types found"], "warning": "recommendation"}

smart_file_naming.prompt: Based on the content of this document, suggest a descriptive filename (max 50 characters, use underscores, no special characters). Return as JSON: {"suggested_name": "filename", "reason": "why this name"}

table_extraction.prompt: If this document contains tables, extract them and return as JSON arrays. Format: {"tables": [{"headers": [], "rows": [[]]}]}. If no tables, return empty array.

key_info_extraction.prompt: Extract key information from this document: dates, amounts (monetary values), names of people/organizations, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses. Return as JSON: {"dates": [], "amounts": [], "names": [], "addresses": [], "contacts": []}

smart_annotation.prompt: Analyze this document page and suggest areas that might need highlighting or annotation (important clauses, key figures, dates, warnings). Return as JSON: {"suggestions": [{"text": "what to highlight", "reason": "why", "priority": "high|medium|low"}]}

document_quality.prompt: Assess the quality of this document scan. Check for: readability, blur, skew, lighting, completeness. Return as JSON: {"quality_score": 0-100, "issues": ["list of issues"], "suggestions": ["improvement suggestions"]}
